solution_line_template: All the students will present their projects in {num_students} * {time_per_student} = <<{num_students}*{time_per_student}={total_presentation_minutes}>>{total_presentation_minutes} minutes.
It will take {total_presentation_minutes} / {period_length} = <<{total_presentation_minutes}/{period_length}={num_periods}>>{num_periods} periods for all the students to present their projects.
